titles.title: For the relief of Livio B. Colosimo.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Housing and Memorial Affairs.

bill.summary: 6/17/1993--Introduced. Deems a named individual to have held the grade of second lieutenant in the U.S. Army Air Corps at the time of his discharge for purposes of the inscription on a headstone or grave marker.
